hero.description: I am a Full Stack Developer from Jaffna, Sri Lanka, specializing in MERN Stack and Python-based backend development. I am currently open to new job opportunities.

about.title: About Me
about.para1: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with hands-on experience in building modern, scalable web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) along with Python-based backend solutions.
about.para2: I enjoy turning complex problems into clean, efficient solutions. From designing responsive user interfaces to developing secure REST APIs and managing databases, I focus on writing maintainable code and delivering high-quality software.

items.name: Full Stack Web Development
items.desc: End-to-end web application development using MERN stack with clean UI, scalable backend, and secure APIs.

items.name: Frontend Development
items.desc: Building responsive and interactive user interfaces using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and modern UI frameworks.

items.name: Backend Development
items.desc: Developing robust backend systems using Node.js, Express.js, and Python (Django / FastAPI) with RESTful APIs.

items.name: Database Design & Management
items.desc: Designing and managing databases using MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL with optimized data models.

items.name: API Development & Integration
items.desc: Creating secure REST APIs and integrating third-party services for seamless data communication.

items.name: Deployment & Maintenance
items.desc: Deploying applications on cloud platforms and maintaining performance, security, and scalability.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.desc: I am currently available to take on new project, So feel free a message about anything that you want me to work on. You can Contact anytime.
